summary: Gives you more perk points per level, no more, no less.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Yes, I know there are other mods that does this already, however, on trying them out, I found that they either, don't work, do too much unnecessary stuff, or runs on game load. Thus, created this as simple as possible mod for myself.

[u][b]Features[/b]:
[/u][/size][list=1]
[*][size=3]Retroactive, if you activate the mod at lv50 and get to 51, you'll have 100 extra perk points. (default is 2 extra point per level)[/size]
[*][size=3]Dead simple, 5 lines of script that run on level up only. Should be compatible with everything.[/size]
[/list][size=3]
[u][b]Configuration:
[/b][/u][/size][list=1]
[*][size=3]tilt key to open console[/size]
[*][size=3][i]set MorePerkPerLevel to[/i] X[/size]
[size=3](X being however many extra perk point you want per level, default is 2)[/size]
[*][size=3]go get a level up[/size]
[/list][size=3]
[u][b]Troubleshooting[/b][/u]:
[/size][list]
[*][size=3]The formula for how many perks you get on lv up is as follows:[/size]
[*][size=3]((newLevel - 1) * MorePerkPerLevel) - PerksAlreadyGiven[/size]
[*][size=3]set MorePerkPerLevelGiven to X (if you feel anything is wrong and want to manually fix it)[/size]
[/list][size=3]
[u][b]FAQ[/b][/u]:
[/size][list]
[*][size=3]Why is there no MCM?[/size]
[*][size=3]Because MCM requires OnGameLoad event, and that event is simply way too over populated right now. I have tweaked and bash my Skyrim into a form that almost never crashes now, EXCEPT on game load, where it crashes 50% of the time. It's not any mod's fault, but as it stands right now, I believe there is simply way too many mods doing way too many stuff on game load.[/size]
[/list][size=3]
[list]
[*]It doesn't work, I don't see the extra perk points
[*]The skill screen don't refresh to show the extra perks points right away, exit the screen and come back.
[/list]
